title: 3dbucket
description: Concatenate sub-bricks from input datasets into one big bucket dataset.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Use 'pname' for the output dataset prefix name.

output.title: Output
output.description: Use 'pname' for the output dataset prefix name.

session.title: Session
session.description: Use 'dir' for the output dataset session directory. [default='./'=current working directory]

glueto.title: Glue to
glueto.description: Append bricks to the end of the 'fname' dataset.

aglueto.title: A-Glue to
aglueto.description: If fname dataset does not exist, create it (like -prefix). Otherwise append to fname (like -glueto).

dry.title: Dry run
dry.description: Execute a 'dry run'; only print out what would be done.

verbose.title: Verbose
verbose.description: Print out some verbose output as the program proceeds.

abuc.title: Anatomical Bucket
abuc.description: Create an anatomical bucket. If neither of these options is given, the output type is determined from the first input type.

input_files.title: Input Files
input_files.description: Input datasets with optional sub-brick selection.
